bibl.title: Ninnaros to His Son Zosimos: A Father Getting Impatient.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: This papyrus was edited as part of the International Seminar on the Cairo Papyri. P. Fay. 224 descr. (= P. Cair. Inv. 10821). Euhemeria (Qasr el-Banat), 2nd century CE. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Noha A. Salem, Ninnaros to His Son Zosimos: A Father Getting Impatient.
